org.sakaiproject.user.impl

Class PasswordService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.user.impl.PasswordService

  • public class PasswordService
extends Object
    Service to check that a password matches and to generate encrypted passwords from plaintext. By default it's salted and SHA-256 digested.
    Author:
    buckett

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MD5_SALT_SHA256
      Prefix for password that was converted from an MD5 one.
      static String MD5TRUNC_SALT_SHA256
      Prefix for password that was converted from an MD5 one with the SAK-5922 bug.

      • hash

        protected String hash(String password,
          String algorithm)
        Digest and Base64 encode the password.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to hash.
        algorithm - The Digest Algorithm to use.
        Returns:
        The digested password or null if it failed.

      • salt

        protected String salt(int length)
        Generate a salt which is Base64 encoded.
        Parameters:
        length - The number of bytes to use for the source.
        Returns:
        A Base64 version of the salt. So it's longer than the source length.
